channel.title: Looking for Beta Testors for a Restoration Project
channel.description:
[u]Server Info[/u]
[317 Revision] [DeltaScape Source and NonRenamed Client]
All in all, the combat is shit (Delta) and most skills work SOMEWHAT like they did in RuneScape. I need them working 100%
Needed: Thoughts and opinions on what needs to be completed first and foremost to create as close to the old RS experience as possible.
Staff positions will most likely be given to Closed Beta testers when Open Beta is released.
Contact via: Email: Ncswims@hotmail.com Skype: Nick.conrad2

item.title: Looking for Beta Testors for a Restoration Project
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Give people some more information about your server/thoughts on creating a server.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for Beta Testors for a Restoration Project
